name: The Titan Expedition
description:
Navigate the treacherous surface of Saturn's largest moon, Titan, on your way to discover an ancient alien pyramid, in this short but atmospheric puzzle game.

Take your time to carefully light the beacons as you explore the maze of sharp rocks and deep chasms, but beware of losing your footing if you venture too far into the darkness.

Originally made for the #DraknekUni challenge, this game was made in just 7 days using Bitsy. All art, text and design is my own, all sound effects are CC0 from FreeSound.org
